properties.areaDesc: Burleigh, ND; McLean, ND; Morton, ND; Oliver, ND
properties.headline: Hydrologic Outlook issued January 8 at 5:05PM CST by NWS Bismarck ND
properties.description:
Colder weather is forming more ice on the Missouri River below
Garrison dam. Near complete ice cover should be expected within
the next couple days for the Missouri River between Morton and
Burleigh counties. Higher water levels are expected up north of
the Bismarck Mandan area. Even though problematic high water is
rare this time of year, it cannot be ruled as ice forms and shifts.
Due to the length of colder weather expected, ice formation and
higher water on the Missouri River between Oliver and McLean
counties is likely as well.

NWSheadline: ANOTHER ROUND OF ICE FORMATION ON MISSOURI RIVER
